purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of resources used or consumed by an activity.

Resource as realized may have the following characteristics:
A resource as realized can refer to a defined resource item
A resource as realized can be referenced by one or more activities
A resource as realized can be related back to the corresponding resource requirements.

The following are not enabled by this module alone but are enabled by modules that use this module:
Identification assignment
Property, date and descriptive representation assignments.
purpose.note:
A resource as realized can be given an identifier using the
Identification assignment module.

inscope.li: Recording of resources used or consumed by one or more activities
Recording of usage or consuption of actual as well as types of resource items
Recording of the relationship between the resource as realized and the corresponding resource requirement statements.

outscope.li: Identification and detailed descriptions of recorded resources
